title: Casey's Courage
description: Just as accomplished horse trainer Casey Mason, PhD feels sheâ€™s earned her independence, disaster strikes and her life is forever changed. She must put her life back together bit by piece. The obstacles seem insurmountable, making her wonder if love really can conquer all.Billionaire Jordan Spencer III inherits Spencer Ranch where the riding buddy of his youth still lives. Now Casey is a beautiful, accomplished woman who starts creeping into his thoughts. Bitter experiences from the past put him off having a serious relationship with a woman, yet he and Casey have a special connection. As she struggles with her rehabilitation, he micromanages her life with quiet efficiency until he pushes her past some invisible line. He soon learns more about himself than makes him comfortable. Coming to terms with the past so he can move on to the future takes lots of soul searching, as his precious Casey slips in and out of his thoughts and dreams.
author: Neva Brown
